类 ClientInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientInstance

  • class ClientInstance
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a client intance connecting to a server and sending data back and forth. If anything goes wrong with the connection, for example the host is not there or is listening on a different port, an exception is thrown.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.lang.String ACCEPTED
      The String replies to user that the username has not been used and is accpeted.
      private java.io.BufferedReader in
      A BufferReader for a client instance.
      private boolean isAllowedToChat
      Whether the client is allowed to chat in the room after profile setup.
      private boolean isServerConnected
      A continuous state whether the client is connected with the server.
      private java.io.PrintWriter out
      A PrintWriter for a client instance.
      private int PORT_NUMBER
      The port number is a way to identify a specific process to which an Internet or other network message is to be forwarded when it arrives at a server.
      private int REDUCED_TIMEOUT
      The reduced connection response timeout.
      private java.net.Socket socket
      A Socket for a client instance.
      private java.lang.String WELCOME
      The string asks client to input a username.

      ClientInstance() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      (专用程序包) void closeConnection()
      Closes the client connection from the server by shuting down the client sockets
      private void establishConnection()
      Builds a connection with the server.
      private java.lang.String getClientInput(java.lang.String hint)
      Returns a message input by the client.
      private void handleIncomingMessages()
      Receives the messages from the server by a listener thread.
      private void handleOutgoingMessages()
      Sends the messages input by the client to the server by a sender Thread.
      private void handleProfileSetUp()
      Sets up the profile of the client.
      void start()
      Starts running the client.
      static boolean validIP(java.lang.String ip)
      Returns whether the input IP is correct in the Ipv4 format.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        private final int PORT_NUMBER
        The port number is a way to identify a specific process to which an Internet or other network message is to be forwarded when it arrives at a server.

      • start

        Starts running the client.

      • establishConnection

        private void establishConnection()
        Builds a connection with the server.

      • validIP

        public static boolean validIP(java.lang.String ip)
        Returns whether the input IP is correct in the Ipv4 format.
        参数:
        ip - the IP address the user input
        返回:
        true if the given ip address is in valid format to this string, false otherwise

      • handleProfileSetUp

        private void handleProfileSetUp()
        Sets up the profile of the client.

      • handleOutgoingMessages

        private void handleOutgoingMessages()
        Sends the messages input by the client to the server by a sender Thread.

      • getClientInput

        private java.lang.String getClientInput(java.lang.String hint)
        Returns a message input by the client.
        参数:
        hint - the hint message to be outprint on Client screen
        返回:
        a message input by the client

      • handleIncomingMessages

        private void handleIncomingMessages()
        Receives the messages from the server by a listener thread.
